    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: from . import util
    4: 
    5: 
    6: @pytest.mark.slow
    7: class TestRenamedFunc(util.F2PyTest):
    8:     sources = [
    9:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "routines", "funcfortranname.f"),
   10:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "routines", "funcfortranname.pyf"),
   11:     ]
   12:     module_name = "funcfortranname"
   13: 
   14:     def test_gh25799(self):
   15:         assert dir(self.module)
   16:         assert self.module.funcfortranname_default(200, 12) == 212
   17: 
   18: 
   19: @pytest.mark.slow
   20: class TestRenamedSubroutine(util.F2PyTest):
   21:     sources = [
   22:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "routines", "subrout.f"),
   23:         util.getpath("tests", "src", "routines", "subrout.pyf"),
   24:     ]
   25:     module_name = "subrout"
   26: 
   27:     def test_renamed_subroutine(self):
   28:         assert dir(self.module)
   29:         assert self.module.subrout_default(200, 12) == 212
